whole_object: When the chairs outside the bistro staged a protest for being left out in the cold, they decided to make a stand but ended up sitting down on the job.
single_object:
- Bistro: This bistro is so popular, even the chef has to book a table to taste his own cooking!
- Tables: These tables are such gossips, always chatting about the meals they've had on top of them.
- Chairs: The chairs here are truly outstanding; they stand out more than they sit in.
- Building: This building is such a show-off, always trying to rise above its neighbors.
- Tree: This tree is the ultimate networker, constantly branching out.
- Lamp post: This lamp post is so bright, it's got a PhD in illumination.
multi_object:
- Bistro  
- Tables  
- The bistro is so popular, even the tables are booked for dinner!

- Tables  
- Chairs  
- These tables are feeling a bit wobbly; they need their chairs to support them!

- Chairs  
- Lamp post  
- The chairs are jealous of the lamp post; it always gets to stand tall while they just sit around!

- Building  
- Tree  
- The building told the tree, "Stop leafing me out of your plans!"

- Tree  
- Bistro  
- The tree is trying to branch out by opening a bistro, but it keeps getting stumped! 

- Lamp post  
- Building  
- The lamp post said to the building, "You really know how to raise the roof!"

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: The bistro is so popular, even the tables are booked for dinner!
These tables are feeling a bit wobbly; they need their chairs to support them!
The chairs are jealous of the lamp post; it always gets to stand tall while they just sit around!
The building told the tree, "Stop leafing me out of your plans!"
The tree is trying to branch out by opening a bistro, but it keeps getting stumped!
The lamp post said to the building, "You really know how to raise the roof!"
